name: Auras of Swift Vengeance
description:
Learn Retribution Aura and Crusader Aura:

 Retribution Aura:
When any party or raid member within 40 yards dies, you gain Avenging Wrath for 8 sec.

When any party or raid member within 40 yards takes more than 50% of their health in damage in a single hit, you gain Seraphim for 4 sec. This cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yards.
